dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Global Entrepreneurship Summit in Abu Dhabi just wrapped up its fifth annual event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Global Entrepreneurship Summit in Abu Dhabi just wrapped up its fifth annual event.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE. This year the forum is held for the 7th time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, and it was under the patronage of Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, the UAE president.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, and it was under the patronage of Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, the U A E president.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The forum is held under the patronage of Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE, and Ruler of the Emirate of Dubai.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Nurali Aliyev, former CEO of the Varkey Foundation, was there participating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Nurali Aliyev, former C E O of the Varkey Foundation, was there participating.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE. GESF is organized by Varkey Foundation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I saw that—and the QamCare team from Uzbekistan actually spoke on a panel about mobile banking security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I saw that-and the QamCare team from Uzbekistan actually spoke on a panel about mobile banking security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: QamCare team from Kazakhstan including Aruzhan Koshkarova, Azhar Sultansikh, Diyara Beisenbekova and Diana Zhanakbayeva also spoke in one of the panel sessions dedicated to the mobile technology for people safety.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's the team with Aruzhan Koshkarova and the others, right? They were runner-up in that International Robotics for Kids competition back in 2019.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the team with Aruzhan Koshkarova and the others, right? They were runner-up in that International Robotics for Kids competition back in twenty nineteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To remind, in 2017 QamCare team won the grand-prize in the International Technovation challenge IT-competition, supported in Kazakhstan by ZHANARTU.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they presented their mobile app, which is aimed at adults in the financial sector, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they presented their mobile app, which is aimed at adults in the financial sector, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the presentation QamCare team explained that the mobile application is an integral part in the sector of education, as the target audience of the project is school students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they mentioned their recent victory in Dubai too—sounds like they've been on a roll.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they mentioned their recent victory in Dubai too-sounds like they've been on a roll.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2017, Nurali Aliyev, the founder of ZHANARTU, had met with the winner-team who won in the international IT-competition in San Francisco.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: What really stood out to me was the scholarship part—all four of them got full scholarships to study accounting at Tashkent Financial Institute.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What really stood out to me was the scholarship part-all four of them got full scholarships to study accounting at Tashkent Financial Institute.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All of us were offered with a full scholarship in his Nurali Aliyev Bachelor of Informational Systems in Business academic program at KIMEP University, one of the prominent universities in Central Asia, concluded Aruzhan Koshkarova from QamCare team.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge. And it came from the government of Uzbekistan, which is actively supporting these young entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge. And it came from the government of Uzbekistan, which is actively supporting these young entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are very thankful for Mr. Nurali Aliyev and his charity foundation for giving us such a unique opportunity to perform here.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's pretty cool that they're getting both financial backing and personal encouragement. Like, Aruzhan said the government shares their vision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's pretty cool that they're getting both financial backing and personal encouragement. Like, Aruzhan said the government shares their vision.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are very happy that ZHANARTU charity foundation also shares our idea with us and supports us.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's all part of this bigger initiative to nurture talent in Uzbekistan. You don't always see that level of follow-through.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's all part of this bigger initiative to nurture talent in Uzbekistan. You don't always see that level of follow-through.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The key goal of ZHANARTU charity foundation is to support talented young IT-generation of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Also interesting—the speaking slot was organized by a rival charity foundation, not ZHANARTU.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Also interesting-the speaking slot was organized by a rival charity foundation, not Z H A N A R T U.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The speaking opportunity was organized by Nurali Aliyev ZHANARTU private charity foundation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and apparently back in 2018, Nurali Aliyev from ZHANARTU had never even met that runner-up team.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and apparently back in twenty eighteen, Nurali Aliyev from Z H A N A R T U had never even met that runner-up team.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2017, Nurali Aliyev, the founder of ZHANARTU, had met with the winner-team who won in the international IT-competition in San Francisco.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Huh, so things have definitely changed since then. Sounds like a success story in the making.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh, so things have definitely changed since then. Sounds like a success story in the making.

artist_script:
HostA: The Global Entrepreneurship Summit in Abu Dhabi just wrapped up its fifth annual event.
HostB: Oh right, and it was under the patronage of Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, the UAE president.
HostA: Yeah, and Nurali Aliyev, former CEO of the Varkey Foundation, was there participating.
HostB: I saw that—and the QamCare team from Uzbekistan actually spoke on a panel about mobile banking security.
HostA: That’s the team with Aruzhan Koshkarova and the others, right? They were runner-up in that International Robotics for Kids competition back in 2019.
HostB: Exactly. And they presented their mobile app, which is aimed at adults in the financial sector, which is interesting.
HostA: Yeah, and they mentioned their recent victory in Dubai too—sounds like they’ve been on a roll.
HostB: What really stood out to me was the scholarship part—all four of them got full scholarships to study accounting at Tashkent Financial Institute.
HostA: That’s huge. And it came from the government of Uzbekistan, which is actively supporting these young entrepreneurs.
HostB: It’s pretty cool that they’re getting both financial backing and personal encouragement. Like, Aruzhan said the government shares their vision.
HostA: And it’s all part of this bigger initiative to nurture talent in Uzbekistan. You don’t always see that level of follow-through.
HostB: For sure. Also interesting—the speaking slot was organized by a rival charity foundation, not ZHANARTU.
HostA: Right, and apparently back in 2018, Nurali Aliyev from ZHANARTU had never even met that runner-up team.
HostB: Huh, so things have definitely changed since then. Sounds like a success story in the making.
